content:
I don't have personal preferences, but i can suggest some modern dance performances you might want to check out:

1. martha graham dance company
2. alvin ailey american dance theater
3. batsheva dance company
4. merce cunningham dance company
5. trisha brown dance company
6. paul taylor american modern dance

these are all renowned modern dance companies that have been around for many years and produce outstanding modern dance performances. you can watch their performances online or in theaters.
